content.rendered:
Directed by Zoya Akhtar.

Written by Reema Kagti. Javed Akhtar. Farhan Akhtar.

Cast Anil Kapoor(Kamal Mehra). Shefali Shah(Neelam Mehra (as Shefali Shetty)). Priyanka Chopra Jonas(Ayesha Mehra (as Priyanka Chopra)). Ranveer Singh(Kabir Mehra). Anushka Sharma(Farah Ali). Farhan Akhtar(Sunny Gill). Rahul Bose(Manav). Aamir Khan(Pluto (voice)). Zarina Wahab(Manav’s mother). Vikrant Massey(Rana Khanna) . Yousaf Bokhari Bustamante(Entertainment Manager). Ozge Cagaloglu(Tourist guide at Hagia Sofia). Pawan Chopra(Prem Mehra). Hale Cigek(Singer in King Bar). Khushi Dubey(Putlu Mehra). Celil Gezer(Bar tender). Sarah Hashmi(Divya Mehra). Yaprak Piren Karpuzoglu(Guler). Iqlaq Khan(Amrish Gill (as Ikhlaque Khan)). Emrah Kolukisaoglu(Tender boat staff). Martijn Kuiper(Doctor). Preiti Mamgain(Vandana Khanna). Jonathan Maravilla(Staff manager (as Jonathan Alonso Flete)). Dolly Minhas(Naina Sood (as Dolly Mattoo)). Ayesha Raza Mishra(Indu Mehra). Manoj Pahwa(Vinod Khanna). Vivienne Pocha(Singer in Cha Cha Cha night club). Ivan Rodrigues(Dharmapala Sr.). Vandana Sajnani(Anju Chopra). Ariadna Santana(Hotel receptionist). Kenya Alexia Sauder Scolamieri(Dancer). Parmeet Sethi(Lalit Sood). Debanshi Shah(Nitya). K.C. Shankar(Dharmpala). Shireesh Sharma(Jamaal Hashmi). Avneet Singh(Naren). Krantikari Singh(Housekeeper 3). Shivrama Singh(Sandhya). Ridhima Sud(Nuri Sood). Sunil(Housekeeper 1).Kallirroi Tziafeta. Abdul Quadir Amin(Shipcrew (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Farhan Akhtar. Vikesh Bhutani. Anna Cassina. Zeki Kahveci. Riccardo Rogazione. Suat Saglam. Shivani Saran. Ritesh Sidhwani. Yasmine Stafford. Xavier Wakefield.

Production Babieka. Babieka. Excel Entertainment.
